entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:30 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
